body.p: A Data Science team has been contracted by a health club to develop a model that will predict whether a potential client will purchase a membership. This is an example of:

feedback.p: Incorrect: A business need is stated in broader terms and in this case, it would be acquiring new members.
Correct: An analytic objective will support a business objective and states how analytical methods (in this case a predictive model) can be applied to a scenario to meet a business objective.
Incorrect: The objective will help you reach the health club's business objective.

body.p: An IT Department would like to increase customer satisfaction by successfully closing help tickets after 12 hours. This is considered a(n):

feedback.p: Correct: It is a measurable goal that will meet a business need.
Incorrect: Business needs are statements of the current status of the company without a proposed solution.
Incorrect: There is no indicator here that the company is ready to address a business need with analytics.
